title: Ticket #3437: Confirm OpenStack Essex statuses copied to GridJobStatus
description: I should be able to use FutureGrid's OpenStack resources to test if HTCondor correctly copies the instance status strings reported by OpenStack's Essex release to the job ad attribute GridJobStatus. Appropriately reacting to that status is ticket #3367.
remarks:
2013-Jan-15 15:59:19 by tlmiller:
Confirmed. I even found a job on FutureGrid's OpenStack in the 'shutoff' state and hacked up a job ad so that the grid manager and EC2 GAHP would take a look at it: 

  $ condor_history -l 154 | grep GridJobStatus
  GridJobStatus = "shutoff"
creator: tlmiller
